Name: Wrath of the Samurai
About the game: Wrath of the Samurai is a made for VR strategy hack and slash game that takes inspiration from old hack and slash titles and implements them into virtual reality, you are a Ronin samurai pitted against thousands of enemies. Slash your way to victory with sword, shuriken or bow and rack up as many kills as you can for bigger rewards! Wrath of the Samurai has a campaign mode as well as an arena mode for those who just want to kill as much as possible as quickly as possible, with realistic sword physics you are in full control of your actions.
Meta Title: Wrath of the Samurai: Jul 9, 2019, Aikirob and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wrath of the Samurai? Check out the release date (Jul 9, 2019), developer insights from Aikirob, and a complete game summary.
